location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 74 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing a translated copy of a letter addressed to the Imam of Muscat (Saʻīd bin Sulṭān) by Mohumed Ali Pasha [Muḥammad ‘Alī Bāshā], the present ruler of Egypt, dated 8 Shavel (16 May 1826(.The enclosed letter discusses the state of affairs of Toorky [Turkī ibn ʻAbd Allāh, Amir of Najd] and recent military victories which Mohumed Ally Pasha's armies had achieved against his forces.
